spec.title: Toubkal Summit Trek
spec.description: A challenging but rewarding trek to the summit of Mount Toubkal, the highest peak in North Africa.

steps.title: Journey to Imlil
steps.description: Take a shared taxi from Marrakech to Imlil. The fare is typically for a seat (1/6 of the taxi). Note that shared taxis may be less frequent in the evening.

steps.title: Preparation & Booking
steps.description: Book a certified mountain guide (mandatory for Toubkal). Rent or buy necessary hiking gear (boots, warm clothes). Arrange lunch and book your stay at the refuge. Don't forget to buy snacks for the trail.

steps.title: Overnight in Imlil
steps.description: Spend the Friday night in Imlil to acclimatize. Enjoy the local hospitality and rest before the hike.

steps.title: Breakfast
steps.description: Wake up and enjoy a hearty breakfast at your hotel or in the village.

steps.title: Trek to Checkpoint
steps.description: Begin your trek passing through Aroumd village. Check in at the Toubkal National Park Gendarmerie post.

steps.title: Hike to Chamharouch
steps.description: Continue the ascent towards the Sidi Chamharouch shrine.

steps.title: Break at Sidi Chamharouch
steps.description: Take a rest at the shrine. You can buy refreshments here.

steps.title: Reach Refuge
steps.description: Continue hiking to the refuge. Have dinner and get a good night's sleep.

steps.title: Summit Push
steps.description: Wake up early (around 4 AM) to start the climb to the summit.

steps.title: Sunrise at Toubkal Peak
steps.description: Reach the summit (4167m) in time for a breathtaking sunrise.

steps.title: Descent to Refuge
steps.description: Descend back to the refuge for a well-deserved break and lunch.

steps.title: Return to Imlil
steps.description: Descend through Aroumd back to Imlil.

steps.title: Relax & Shop
steps.description: If you're tired, spend another night in Imlil, enjoy nature, or do some shopping for local crafts.
